description: This Grafana dashboard offers a basic overview of key performance metrics for Docker containers in your system.

targets.expr: (time() - container_last_seen{name="postgres"}) and on() ((time() - container_last_seen{name="postgres"}) > 0) or on() vector(180)
((time() - container_last_seen{name="fgapi-uat"}) and on() ((time() - container_last_seen{name="fgapi-uat"}) > 0)) or on() vector(180)

title: cAdvisor Docker Insights - RA
